name: BetterCupid
description: Enhances the functionality of the OkCupid website. This extension was written by a bored fan and is not endorsed by OkCupid.

modules.name: Recently Visited
modules.description: Provides enhanced functionality for the list of Recently Visited members, including the ability to store and maintain more than just the past 8 visitors.

modules.name: You Might Like
modules.description: Provides additional settings for the You Might Like panel on the home screen.
